item.description:
UZ will have our January 2009 Monthly Meet Up to discuss;

Current National and Local Events

Conspiracies

We have a new President now.
Any comments on the next 4 to
8 years with him, unless he is impeached.

You can look at our message board regarding my
Opinion of our 44th president.

Paranormal Issues

What do we want to do in 2009?

We will be at a Raw Food Cafe.
This will be a non-alcoholic and
Non Smoking event.
I will be getting pizza from the corner pizza parlor.
I will be getting coffee from the Dunkin Donuts down the
Road.

In the back ground there will be music.

If you cannot attend, then give us your ideas, comments and questions
For us to discuss at the Meet Up.

We will give the results in a later Meet Up Trip Report.

This is a reminder memo a few days before this Meet Up.

Look At Me Now/Catch a Healthy Habit is across the
Street from the West Haven Green.

POC Lori Larsen
(203) 933-2200

You can either park on Campbell Ave or
On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street
Of Curtis Place next to
Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant.
There is a large parking area behind there.
Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards
Marc Anthony's.
Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to
Look at Me Now.

This event will be rescheduled if there is bad weather
Such as a major snow storm or icy weather.

http://www.lookatmeno...

www.lookatmenow22.com/

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

Organizer

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: The Cafe is small enough that someone can point me out.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone has Our January 2009 Monthly Meet Up
